comment: NEAT.....Nose of candy, taste of sweet caramel with mild spice and lingering sweet corn, smooth though for 90 proof
Not super smooth or complex. I really like the heat. Great spice.

Aroma: Sweet. Hints of caramel. 

Taste: Rye, but sweet. Medium fullness. Mild heat.

Aroma vanilla. Honey. Sugar. No heat from alcohol. 

Slightly caramel. Light rye. Mild vanilla. Almost no alcohol heat.
